}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "142000001522A R0A", "PER801-01", and a date code of "1628" :is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/HED-ML60MDSB FCC photos] ([[Accton]]).
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://presto-eng.com/News/Press-Release/Presto-Engineering-and-Peraso-Technologies-Develop-Innovative-Test-Solution-for-60-GHz-Transceiver.html ''Press release'' on '''Presto'''] *[http://www.eenewsautomotive.com/news/60-ghz-chipset-wigig-outdoor-wireless-infrastructure ''News'' on '''eeNewsAutomotive''']
==See also== *[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18BF]] - ''MetroLinq 60GHz Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601 HEDML60PRS4601] (2017-10-26) • [[Accton]] (USB 3.0) :WLAN: [[Peraso]] [https://perasotech.com/x-series-products/ PRS4601] (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) ::"142000001731X REV:0B", "PER805-02", "1736" - [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601/External-Photos/External-Photos-3616968 PCB] *[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18]] - ''MetroLinq 60 GHz Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HED-ML60MDSB HED-ML60MDSB] (2016-05-05) • [[Accton]] (USB 3.0) :WLAN: [[Peraso]] [https://perasotech.com/x-series-products/ PRS4601] (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1126 (RFIC) ::"142000001522A R0A", "PER801-01", "1628", "IgniteNet" ::"142000001331A", "PER079-02-A", "03-16", "IgniteNet"
